name: Depression
description: A mood disorder characterized by persistent sadness, loss of interest or pleasure, and feelings of hopelessness.

name: Anxiety Disorders
description: A group of disorders characterized by excessive worry, fear, or anxiety, often leading to avoidance behavior.

name: Bipolar Disorder
description: A mood disorder marked by extreme shifts in mood, including manic episodes of elevated mood and energy.

name: Schizophrenia
description: A severe mental disorder characterized by distorted thinking, hallucinations, and delusions.

name: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
description: A condition that can develop after exposure to a traumatic event, leading to flashbacks, nightmares, and severe anxiety.

name: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
description: A disorder characterized by intrusive, repetitive thoughts (obsessions) and the need to perform certain rituals or behaviors (compulsions).
symptoms: Anxiety when rituals are not performed

name: Eating Disorders
description: A group of conditions, including anorexia nervosa and bulimia nervosa, characterized by unhealthy eating habits and body image concerns.

name: Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
description: A neurodevelopmental disorder marked by symptoms such as inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity.

name: Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD)
description: A condition characterized by unstable relationships, self-image, and emotions, often leading to impulsive behavior and intense mood swings.

name: Substance Use Disorder
description: A condition involving the excessive use of drugs or alcohol, often leading to physical and psychological dependence.
symptoms: Neglecting other activities in favor of substance use
